name: Get To The Other Side
description:
Here's our entry for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 :

We created this game in less than a week with Unity3D, hence the shortness of the gameplay.

The player has, like the title tells, to get to the other side. He must get to the end tunnel without touching the red obstacles, whereas the green ones are here for help.

$

The assets used are :

-Character Movement Fundamentals

-MPUIKit

-Gridbox Prototype Materials

Credits :

Game Design, Level Design, Programming, VFX, Animation, UI : FX_Bear

Music & SFX : Daniel Wave
